title: Watch Michael Bay’s 6 Underground Trailer with Ryan Reynolds
text:
Cars? Fast. Buildings? Tall. Everything else? Exploding. In 6 Underground, Ryan Reynolds is deep-deep undercover as one of six vigilantes who have faked their own deaths in order to kill some of the most dangerous criminals in the world, but the bad guys are onto them, eager for a fight and to try out their sick colorful gas masks. Michael Bay directs this movie made for Reynolds to combine his action-star good looks with his Deadpool humor. Co-stars include Mélanie Laurent, Corey Hawkins, Adria Arjona, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Ben Hardy, Lior Raz, Payman Maadi, and Dave Franco. It’ll be on Netflix this December 13.

Related
description: ’Deadpool’ star Ryan Reynolds stars in Michael Bay’s latest explosion-fest. Watch the ‘6 Underground’ trailer now.
